modName: Kill Balgruuf Essential Protected Invulnerable Ghost Actor
summary: Kill Balgruuf and the rest of Essential Protected Invulnerable Ghost Actor
descriptionHtml:
UPDATED VERSION 6:
FIXED: When you loading a save after installing this mod for the FIRST time, your actor body might become female. Its now fixed.
FIXED: Alduin wont be died because of falling damage when landing to helgen that make the player stuck when climbing up at the helgen keep tower.
NEW: If you start new game with this mod installed, player automatically learn 1st level of Call of Valor: HERO plus added 50 dragon souls to unlock it(*).
(*) You get this only when you arrive at the scene where you have to face a bear in helgen keep cave. See the screenshot. You can summon multiple valor!  

UPDATED VERSION 5:
Recently when i visit sovngarde for my final quest i found 2 bard of sovngarde hero are still essential. Also the guy named \"Tsun\" guard of sovngarde are still invulnerable. These guy are now killable.

READ CAREFULLY WHAT IS THIS MOD ABOUT:

Function:
1.If there is actors you want to be completely DEAD but you cant kill them because the game doesnt allow you.
2.Make zombie from essential actors, such as balgruuf is now possible. Now you can spawn unlimited zombie.
3.Piling corpse will not be removed from the streets. Good for decoration or if you need good zombie later.

Install:
ESP FILE:
1. miong.esp
-put this in data folder, eg: D:\\Program Files\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data\\ -- (put here) --
PEX FILE:
1. QF_DialogueMarkarthIntroWorld_000AF75F.pex
2. WIDeadBodyCleanupScript.pex
3. QF_MQ101_0003372B.pex
-put this in script folder, eg: D:\\Program Files\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data\\Scripts\\ -- (put here) --

Help:
Bug report or help? put it in discussion tab not comment.
I dont accept rating or endorsement. We can\'t eat that anyway. Im doing this just to share the \"Fun\" with others. 

FAQ:
Why is i found your other mod inherited same feature? its difficult to separate CK project. i have to rewrite the code again and it can take days.

Contact:
miongbesar(at)yahoo(dot)com
author: miongbesar

files.name: Kill Balgruuf v2
files.changelogHtml: aplly non-essential + invulnerable to all actors (including children)
